summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Higher Education Skincare: Goal Digger - Silky Moisturizing Cucumber Creme; formulated for dry and sensitive skin; cucumber extract; natural extract: melon, kale, cabbage, ginger, turmeric - 1.7 fl oz Review Date: 2020/07/28 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Item Form': 'Creme', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.88 x 2.88 x 2.13 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381032050'} Review Text: Nice green color with a refreshing cucumber scent. This feels light, not greasy and yet is very effective at moisturizing skin. It's quickly absorbed by my skin. I like that it doesn't have any AHA or retinol so that I can use this day or night in combination with different serums. Review Title: light but very effective Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/08/03 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'} Review Text: I like that the particles are much finer than those in other facial scrubs. Other facial scrubs I've tried have coarser particles, so coarse it feels like I'm rubbing sand on my face.

What I don't like is that the product I received will expire in less than 3 months - Oct 2020. This doesn't seem to be just a one-time occurrence. I also purchased the "Higher Education MBA Night Renewing Serum with 0.5% retinol". That one expires even sooner - on Sep 2020.

I don't know what Amazon's policy is on expiration dates for skin care products. But, if I were purchasing this from a physical store, I wouldn't get something that expires in less than 3 months. I expect a product to be good for at least a year. Granted, expired doesn't automatically mean that a product is unusable. However, customers don't like getting old stock especially when a customer still has to pay full price for it. I didn't it but, if I were, I'd be annoyed enough to return the item.

I also don't know if Higher Education regularly sends soon-to-expire items to Amazon or if they're just doing this to Vine purchases. Either way, that's really not good practice. For a facial scrub that costs $25, I don't expect the seller to pass off expiring products on me.
UPDATE - After going through reviews of the two Higher Education products, it appears that they regularly send soon-to-expire products to customers. Bad seller - Higher Education. Really really bad.

One star for sending me an old product. Amazon, stop selling old products! Customers who paid full price for this - you should return the product. Review Title: expires in less than 3 months Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MBA Renewing Retinol Serum, 1.7 fl. oz, 0.5% Retinol Hydrates & Brightens Skin's Appearance by Diminishing the Look of Breakouts, Hyperpigmentation, and Signs of Aging by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/08/03 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 2.8 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 3.4 x 1.5 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381034009'} Review Text: Received July 23, 2020.

I use this 2x a week in the evenings after applying hyaluronic serum. I've experienced no allergic reaction. I chose this because the retinol concentration (0.5%) isn't too high.

This is the second Higher Education skin care product I've purchased that has a very short expiration period - expires in less than 2 months (Sep 2020). The first was the "Grinding Away skin polishing scrub" that expires in less than 3 months (Oct 2020).

I'm really annoyed that Higher Education is stocking Amazon with old products. If I were paying full price for this, I would expect to receive "fresh" products - with at least a year before expiration. If I were purchasing this from a physical store, I'd give this back to the counter lady and just look for something else.

One star for sending me an old product. Amazon, stop selling old products! Customers who paid full price for this - you should be returning the product. Review Title: expires in less than 2 months Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lnlofen Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower, Exfoliating Long Silicone Body Back Brush, Handle Scrubbing Pad, Easy to Clean, Lathers Well, Comfortable Massage for Shower(Green) Review Date: 2020/09/07 Store: Lnlofen Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.37 x 7.44 x 1.93 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '768894803786'} Review Text: Lnlofen Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower

First of all, it's not 30". It's 29" long. One inch isn't much. Whether 29 or 30", it's still too short for a tall guy with long arms. It also doesn't scrub that well. I have a 130-cm (51 inches) nylon exfoliating scrub from Daiso. That one really makes great contact with my back and can also be folded up tight to scrub the rest of my body (arms, neck, etc.). Folding up this Lnlofen scrubber ends up making it to thick and awkward to scrub my neck, arms, etc. Review Title: Too short, doesn't effectively scrub back, awkward to scrub other parts of body Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders, Soft Silicone Mask Holders for Relieve Ear Pain Caused by Mask (Eagle) Review Date: 2020/09/07 Store: zelaxy Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.3 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'zelaxy'} Review Text: zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders

I find these extenders are necessary when wearing medical masks because the ear loops are often too long for me. I had to use the slots closest to the middle to ensure masks fit snugly and don't fall down. I could just tie another loop to make the loops shorter but I prefer using these extenders because they hold the loops better. My ears are small. Loops tend to just get pulled out from behind my ears. Review Title: Good hold on mask ear loops Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Baby Safety Cotton Swabs for Infant Baby Kid Ear Nose Clean White Cotton Double Tipped Natural Paper Sticks Spiral Head Multipurpose Cotton Buds Cleaning Sticks (M552) Review Date: 2020/10/05 Store: meilamei Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '3.31 x 3.31 x 3.27 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Review Text: Meilamei cotton buds 300 ct

Good. Consistent quality. There are no sticks with missing buds. Having them in a plastic container is also very convenient. It's quite pricey though for cotton swabs though. Review Title: consistent quality but pricey Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Review Date: 2020/11/05 Store: Bouquet Garni Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} Review Text: Bouquet Garni body shower white musk

I didn't realize until I tried this that I love the smell of white musk. I'm looking forward to also trying their lotion and body mist in the same scent.

Lathers well. Review Title: If you're a fan of "white musk", you'll love this Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Review Date: 2020/11/24 Store: Bouquet Garni Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} Review Text: Bouquet Garni Body Shower Vanilla Musk 520 ml / 17.58 Fl. oz.

I've tried the white musk and vanilla musk scents of this body shower. The vanilla musk smells nice (sweeter smell) but I much prefer the white musk scent.

They both lather well and I didn't have any allergic reaction to either of them. Review Title: I prefer white musk Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: HWASHIN 12 Pack 3.4oz/100ml Clear Plastic Spray Bottles with White Fine Mist Sprayers for Essential Oils, Perfumes & Aromatherapy (Brush, Funnels, Droppers, Labels & 30ml Measuring Cup Included) Review Date: 2021/01/01 Store: HWASHIN Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'HWASHIN', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '12', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '12.72 x 7.91 x 3.5 inches; 10.05 Ounces'} Review Text: HWASHIN 3.4-oz plastic spray bottles, 12 pk

I use this for various stuff - cooking oils, essential oils, alcohol. The bottle is good quality but I don't like the spray head. I prefer the gun trigger type because there's little force required to spray. Also, with oils, spray heads don't really work in that you can't get a mist. All you're going to get is a stream of oil unless you dilute that oil. I don't want to dilute my cooking oils so I'm fine with getting just streams instead of mists. Review Title: spray heads not so good Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Neck Gaiter Face Mask , Breathing Face Cover, Reusable Cooling Bandana, Washable Scarf (4 Pack Nebula) Review Date: 2021/02/03 Store: FCY Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 5.43 x 1.34 inches; 5.43 Ounces', 'UPC': '700306867573'} Review Text: FCY (Blue Mars) neck gaiters nebula 4 pk

The colors are very nice. The fabric edges are all finished. They fit very snug against the nose and mouth. The fabric is thin. Coupled with the very snug fit, the outline of your nose and mouth is going to be very visible. Because of the snug fit, talking while wearing this gaiter isn't comfortable.

I got these to provide some blocking against the cold and cold wind. Just as with other gaiters, these aren't meant to filter out very tiny particles like viruses. Review Title: Nice colors but not too comfy when talking Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SimpliGrown Bath Co. Pure Cornstarch Talc-Free Baby Powder with Aloe, Vitamins C & B5, Fragrance Free, 4 Oz Review Date: 2021/04/25 Store: SIMPLIGROWN Product Description: ['SimpliGrown Bath Co. knows that you take your baby/toddler seriously, and honestly, we do too. That\'s why our foaming hand soaps, baby wash, baby shampoo, baby conditioner, baby lotion, baby oil, baby powder, and bottle/dish soaps have the best certified organic ingredients and pure essential oil. So every "body" in your family can be safe and clean. Formulated for babies with sensitive skin,this baby powder won\'t irritate the skin. Pediatrician tested and recommended, free from dyes, artificial fragrances, parabens, pthlates, and SLS. Leaping Bunny certified, vegan, gluten-free, and never tested on animals. So honest, we\'ve listed all ingredients on the label! So whether you\'re using with our other SimpliGrown products or just using this baby powder, you will be happy that you have this product in your house.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SIMPLIGROWN', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture', 'Material Feature': 'Vega, Organic, Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SGBC-BP500-06', 'UPC': '087508176123', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/KI6XB', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Review Text: Simpligrown baby powder

This is cornstarch, not talc. It's good for those who don't want to use talc. The downside is that it feels coarse, not silky smooth, when being spread over skin.

I got this primarily because of the container. It looks nicer than the usual all white bottles of baby powder. I just refill from my larger bottles. Review Title: feels like all other cornstarch Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK,Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist Settings Review Date: 2021/07/25 Store: Cherry Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 6.5 x 3.4 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '791523234156'} Review Text: Cherry Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK, Refillable 16 oz 2pk

I got these because I wanted the glass bottles to hold and keep filtered water handy near the stove for when I'm cooking need to give what I'm cooking a quick spritz of water. I don't like the nozzle because there are only two spray settings. I much prefer fully adjustable nozzles so I ditched the nozzle the bottle came with and just reused an older one I have. Review Title: Glass bottle for cooking water Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Method Gel Hand Wash, Waterfall, 12oz, 3pk Review Date: 2021/11/25 Store: Method Product Description: ["המשקפיים יותר מלאות למחצה. בקבוקי כביסה ביד, גם. יתרה מכך, מלא לחלוטין. ולשם כך, אנו מציעים את המילוי הזה. הוא מלא מספיק ג'ל לשטיפת ידיים כדי למלא את הבקבוק שלך כמעט 3 פעמים (2.8x ליתר דיוק). בנוסף, שטיפת היד שלנו מיוצרת עם נוסחה מתכלה המופעלת על ידי חומרי ניקוי על בסיס צמחי ומרכיבים מתחשבים אחרים, וללא פרבנים או פתלטים. אז מלאו אותו. מכיוון שהדבר היחיד שגרוע יותר מידיים לא מספיק נקיות הוא שימוש בניגוב מכנסיים כפתרון ביניים.النظارات أفضل نصف كامل. زجاجات غسيل يدوي أيضاً. الأفضل من ذلك، كامل تمامًا. ولهذا السبب، نقدم هذه التعبئة. مليء بما فيه الكفاية للغسيل اليدوي من الجل لإعادة ملء زجاجتك تقريبًا 3 مرات (2.8 × على وجه التحديد). بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فإن غسول اليد الخاص بنا مصنوع من تركيبة قابلة للتحلل البيولوجي معززة بمنظفات نباتية ومكونات أخرى مدروسة وخالية من البارابين أو الفثالات. لذا املأها. لأن الشيء الوحيد أسوأ من تنظيف اليدين غير الكافي هو استخدام مسح السراويل كحل مؤقت.眼鏡較半飽。 也可以手洗。 更好的是,完全飽滿。 為此,我們提供此筆芯。 充滿足夠的洗手凝膠,可補充您的瓶子幾乎 3 次(準確 2.8 倍)。 此外,我們的洗手液採用可生物降解的配方,由植物性清潔劑和其他周到的成分製成,不含對羥基苯甲酸酯或鄰苯二甲酸酯。 所以請填寫 'er'。 因為唯一比雙手清潔不足更糟糕的是使用褲子擦拭作為臨時解決方案。 \u200b"] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Method', 'Scent': 'Waterfall', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.25 x 7.48 x 3.31 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ME-395B', 'UPC': '885376710056', 'Manufacturer': 'Alere'} Review Text: Method Gel Hand Wash, Waterfall, 12oz, 3pk

I love the shape of the bottle, the color and the mild sweet scent. The soap was fairly thick. It was adequately sudsy. What I hated was the pump. I couldn't do just a slight push (if I only wanted a small amount). It was hard to push just slightly down. It was easier to give it just one full push but that squirted out too much soap. I suppose manufacturers make it that way so the product gets used up quickly. I replaced the pump head with another pump head (salvaged from my other pump bottles) that was easier to push down. Review Title: Love the soap, hate the pump head Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Travel Bottles for Toiletries, Silicone Travel Size Bottles And Squeezable Containers Holders with belt clip Keychain for Backpack, Shampoo, Liquid, Cosmetic Products(2 oz, 6 Pack) Review Date: 2021/12/02 Store: MACRAY Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MACRAY', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 6.61 x 1.61 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '782938308006'} Review Text: Macray Travel bottle with clip 2oz 6pk - X002N638MR

I wanted to use these to hold hand sanitizer. I clip it to the shoulder strap (on my chest) of my backpack so my hand sanitizer is always within reach. However, this type of container isn't well suited for squeezing out gels in small amounts. The bottle is so soft that you have to really be careful with how you squeeze it. It easily splurts out blobs that are too much for just hand sanitizer. I found these bottles are better used for shampoo, conditioner, body wash where you need much larger volumes squeezed out than you would need for hand sanitizer. Review Title: hard to squeeze out just a small amount Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

So every "body" in your family can be safe and clean. Formulated for babies with sensitive skin,this baby powder won\'t irritate the skin. Pediatrician tested and recommended, free from dyes, artificial fragrances, parabens, pthlates, and SLS. Leaping Bunny certified, vegan, gluten-free, and never tested on animals. So honest, we\'ve listed all ingredients on the label! So whether you\'re using with our other SimpliGrown products or just using this baby powder, you will be happy that you have this product in your house.'] {'Brand': 'SIMPLIGROWN', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture', 'Material Feature': 'Vega, Organic, Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SGBC-BP500-06', 'UPC': '087508176123', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/KI6XB', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Simpligrown baby powder

This is cornstarch, not talc. It's good for those who don't want to use talc. The downside is that it feels coarse, not silky smooth, when being spread over skin.

I got this primarily because of the container. It looks nicer than the usual all white bottles of baby powder. I just refill from my larger bottles. feels like all other cornstarch Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK,Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist Settings Cherry {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 6.5 x 3.4 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '791523234156'} Cherry Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK, Refillable 16 oz 2pk

I got these because I wanted the glass bottles to hold and keep filtered water handy near the stove for when I'm cooking need to give what I'm cooking a quick spritz of water. I don't like the nozzle because there are only two spray settings. I much prefer fully adjustable nozzles so I ditched the nozzle the bottle came with and just reused an older one I have. Glass bottle for cooking water Method Gel Hand Wash, Waterfall, 12oz, 3pk Method ["המשקפיים יותר מלאות למחצה. בקבוקי כביסה ביד, גם. יתרה מכך, מלא לחלוטין. ולשם כך, אנו מציעים את המילוי הזה. הוא מלא מספיק ג'ל לשטיפת ידיים כדי למלא את הבקבוק שלך כמעט 3 פעמים (2.8x ליתר דיוק). בנוסף, שטיפת היד שלנו מיוצרת עם נוסחה מתכלה המופעלת על ידי חומרי ניקוי על בסיס צמחי ומרכיבים מתחשבים אחרים, וללא פרבנים או פתלטים. אז מלאו אותו. מכיוון שהדבר היחיד שגרוע יותר מידיים לא מספיק נקיות הוא שימוש בניגוב מכנסיים כפתרון ביניים.النظارات أفضل نصف كامل. زجاجات غسيل يدوي أيضاً. الأفضل من ذلك، كامل تمامًا. ولهذا السبب، نقدم هذه التعبئة. مليء بما فيه الكفاية للغسيل اليدوي من الجل لإعادة ملء زجاجتك تقريبًا 3 مرات (2.8 × على وجه التحديد). بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فإن غسول اليد الخاص بنا مصنوع من تركيبة قابلة للتحلل البيولوجي معززة بمنظفات نباتية ومكونات أخرى مدروسة وخالية من البارابين أو الفثالات. لذا املأها. لأن الشيء الوحيد أسوأ من تنظيف اليدين غير الكافي هو استخدام مسح السراويل كحل مؤقت.眼鏡較半飽。 也可以手洗。 更好的是,完全飽滿。 為此,我們提供此筆芯。 充滿足夠的洗手凝膠,可補充您的瓶子幾乎 3 次(準確 2.8 倍)。 此外,我們的洗手液採用可生物降解的配方,由植物性清潔劑和其他周到的成分製成,不含對羥基苯甲酸酯或鄰苯二甲酸酯。 所以請填寫 'er'。 因為唯一比雙手清潔不足更糟糕的是使用褲子擦拭作為臨時解決方案。 \u200b"] {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Method', 'Scent': 'Waterfall', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.25 x 7.48 x 3.31 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ME-395B', 'UPC': '885376710056', 'Manufacturer': 'Alere'} Method Gel Hand Wash, Waterfall, 12oz, 3pk

I love the shape of the bottle, the color and the mild sweet scent. The soap was fairly thick. It was adequately sudsy. What I hated was the pump. I couldn't do just a slight push (if I only wanted a small amount). It was hard to push just slightly down. It was easier to give it just one full push but that squirted out too much soap. I suppose manufacturers make it that way so the product gets used up quickly. I replaced the pump head with another pump head (salvaged from my other pump bottles) that was easier to push down. Love the soap, hate the pump head Travel Bottles for Toiletries, Silicone Travel Size Bottles And Squeezable Containers Holders with belt clip Keychain for Backpack, Shampoo, Liquid, Cosmetic Products(2 oz, 6 Pack) MACRAY {'Brand': 'MACRAY', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 6.61 x 1.61 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '782938308006'} Macray Travel bottle with clip 2oz 6pk - X002N638MR

I wanted to use these to hold hand sanitizer. I clip it to the shoulder strap (on my chest) of my backpack so my hand sanitizer is always within reach. However, this type of container isn't well suited for squeezing out gels in small amounts. The bottle is so soft that you have to really be careful with how you squeeze it. It easily splurts out blobs that are too much for just hand sanitizer. I found these bottles are better used for shampoo, conditioner, body wash where you need much larger volumes squeezed out than you would need for hand sanitizer. hard to squeeze out just a small amount
prompt:
Based on this purchase history, summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Higher Education Skincare: Goal Digger - Silky Moisturizing Cucumber Creme; formulated for dry and sensitive skin; cucumber extract; natural extract: melon, kale, cabbage, ginger, turmeric - 1.7 fl oz Review Date: 2020/07/28 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Item Form': 'Creme', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.88 x 2.88 x 2.13 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381032050'} Review Text: Nice green color with a refreshing cucumber scent. This feels light, not greasy and yet is very effective at moisturizing skin. It's quickly absorbed by my skin. I like that it doesn't have any AHA or retinol so that I can use this day or night in combination with different serums. Review Title: light but very effective Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/08/03 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'} Review Text: I like that the particles are much finer than those in other facial scrubs. Other facial scrubs I've tried have coarser particles, so coarse it feels like I'm rubbing sand on my face.

What I don't like is that the product I received will expire in less than 3 months - Oct 2020. This doesn't seem to be just a one-time occurrence. I also purchased the "Higher Education MBA Night Renewing Serum with 0.5% retinol". That one expires even sooner - on Sep 2020.

I don't know what Amazon's policy is on expiration dates for skin care products. But, if I were purchasing this from a physical store, I wouldn't get something that expires in less than 3 months. I expect a product to be good for at least a year. Granted, expired doesn't automatically mean that a product is unusable. However, customers don't like getting old stock especially when a customer still has to pay full price for it. I didn't it but, if I were, I'd be annoyed enough to return the item.

I also don't know if Higher Education regularly sends soon-to-expire items to Amazon or if they're just doing this to Vine purchases. Either way, that's really not good practice. For a facial scrub that costs $25, I don't expect the seller to pass off expiring products on me.
UPDATE - After going through reviews of the two Higher Education products, it appears that they regularly send soon-to-expire products to customers. Bad seller - Higher Education. Really really bad.

One star for sending me an old product. Amazon, stop selling old products! Customers who paid full price for this - you should return the product. Review Title: expires in less than 3 months Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MBA Renewing Retinol Serum, 1.7 fl. oz, 0.5% Retinol Hydrates & Brightens Skin's Appearance by Diminishing the Look of Breakouts, Hyperpigmentation, and Signs of Aging by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/08/03 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 2.8 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 3.4 x 1.5 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381034009'} Review Text: Received July 23, 2020.

I use this 2x a week in the evenings after applying hyaluronic serum. I've experienced no allergic reaction. I chose this because the retinol concentration (0.5%) isn't too high.

This is the second Higher Education skin care product I've purchased that has a very short expiration period - expires in less than 2 months (Sep 2020). The first was the "Grinding Away skin polishing scrub" that expires in less than 3 months (Oct 2020).

I'm really annoyed that Higher Education is stocking Amazon with old products. If I were paying full price for this, I would expect to receive "fresh" products - with at least a year before expiration. If I were purchasing this from a physical store, I'd give this back to the counter lady and just look for something else.

One star for sending me an old product. Amazon, stop selling old products! Customers who paid full price for this - you should be returning the product. Review Title: expires in less than 2 months Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lnlofen Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower, Exfoliating Long Silicone Body Back Brush, Handle Scrubbing Pad, Easy to Clean, Lathers Well, Comfortable Massage for Shower(Green) Review Date: 2020/09/07 Store: Lnlofen Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.37 x 7.44 x 1.93 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '768894803786'} Review Text: Lnlofen Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower

First of all, it's not 30". It's 29" long. One inch isn't much. Whether 29 or 30", it's still too short for a tall guy with long arms. It also doesn't scrub that well. I have a 130-cm (51 inches) nylon exfoliating scrub from Daiso. That one really makes great contact with my back and can also be folded up tight to scrub the rest of my body (arms, neck, etc.). Folding up this Lnlofen scrubber ends up making it to thick and awkward to scrub my neck, arms, etc. Review Title: Too short, doesn't effectively scrub back, awkward to scrub other parts of body Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders, Soft Silicone Mask Holders for Relieve Ear Pain Caused by Mask (Eagle) Review Date: 2020/09/07 Store: zelaxy Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.3 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'zelaxy'} Review Text: zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders

I find these extenders are necessary when wearing medical masks because the ear loops are often too long for me. I had to use the slots closest to the middle to ensure masks fit snugly and don't fall down. I could just tie another loop to make the loops shorter but I prefer using these extenders because they hold the loops better. My ears are small. Loops tend to just get pulled out from behind my ears. Review Title: Good hold on mask ear loops Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Baby Safety Cotton Swabs for Infant Baby Kid Ear Nose Clean White Cotton Double Tipped Natural Paper Sticks Spiral Head Multipurpose Cotton Buds Cleaning Sticks (M552) Review Date: 2020/10/05 Store: meilamei Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '3.31 x 3.31 x 3.27 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Review Text: Meilamei cotton buds 300 ct

Good. Consistent quality. There are no sticks with missing buds. Having them in a plastic container is also very convenient. It's quite pricey though for cotton swabs though. Review Title: consistent quality but pricey Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Review Date: 2020/11/05 Store: Bouquet Garni Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} Review Text: Bouquet Garni body shower white musk

I didn't realize until I tried this that I love the smell of white musk. I'm looking forward to also trying their lotion and body mist in the same scent.

Lathers well. Review Title: If you're a fan of "white musk", you'll love this Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Review Date: 2020/11/24 Store: Bouquet Garni Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} Review Text: Bouquet Garni Body Shower Vanilla Musk 520 ml / 17.58 Fl. oz.

I've tried the white musk and vanilla musk scents of this body shower. The vanilla musk smells nice (sweeter smell) but I much prefer the white musk scent.

They both lather well and I didn't have any allergic reaction to either of them. Review Title: I prefer white musk Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: HWASHIN 12 Pack 3.4oz/100ml Clear Plastic Spray Bottles with White Fine Mist Sprayers for Essential Oils, Perfumes & Aromatherapy (Brush, Funnels, Droppers, Labels & 30ml Measuring Cup Included) Review Date: 2021/01/01 Store: HWASHIN Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'HWASHIN', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '12', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '12.72 x 7.91 x 3.5 inches; 10.05 Ounces'} Review Text: HWASHIN 3.4-oz plastic spray bottles, 12 pk

I use this for various stuff - cooking oils, essential oils, alcohol. The bottle is good quality but I don't like the spray head. I prefer the gun trigger type because there's little force required to spray. Also, with oils, spray heads don't really work in that you can't get a mist. All you're going to get is a stream of oil unless you dilute that oil. I don't want to dilute my cooking oils so I'm fine with getting just streams instead of mists. Review Title: spray heads not so good Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Neck Gaiter Face Mask , Breathing Face Cover, Reusable Cooling Bandana, Washable Scarf (4 Pack Nebula) Review Date: 2021/02/03 Store: FCY Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 5.43 x 1.34 inches; 5.43 Ounces', 'UPC': '700306867573'} Review Text: FCY (Blue Mars) neck gaiters nebula 4 pk

The colors are very nice. The fabric edges are all finished. They fit very snug against the nose and mouth. The fabric is thin. Coupled with the very snug fit, the outline of your nose and mouth is going to be very visible. Because of the snug fit, talking while wearing this gaiter isn't comfortable.

I got these to provide some blocking against the cold and cold wind. Just as with other gaiters, these aren't meant to filter out very tiny particles like viruses. Review Title: Nice colors but not too comfy when talking Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SimpliGrown Bath Co. Pure Cornstarch Talc-Free Baby Powder with Aloe, Vitamins C & B5, Fragrance Free, 4 Oz Review Date: 2021/04/25 Store: SIMPLIGROWN Product Description: ['SimpliGrown Bath Co. knows that you take your baby/toddler seriously, and honestly, we do too. That\'s why our foaming hand soaps, baby wash, baby shampoo, baby conditioner, baby lotion, baby oil, baby powder, and bottle/dish soaps have the best certified organic ingredients and pure essential oil. So every "body" in your family can be safe and clean. Formulated for babies with sensitive skin,this baby powder won\'t irritate the skin. Pediatrician tested and recommended, free from dyes, artificial fragrances, parabens, pthlates, and SLS. Leaping Bunny certified, vegan, gluten-free, and never tested on animals. So honest, we\'ve listed all ingredients on the label! So whether you\'re using with our other SimpliGrown products or just using this baby powder, you will be happy that you have this product in your house.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SIMPLIGROWN', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture', 'Material Feature': 'Vega, Organic, Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SGBC-BP500-06', 'UPC': '087508176123', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/KI6XB', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Review Text: Simpligrown baby powder

This is cornstarch, not talc. It's good for those who don't want to use talc. The downside is that it feels coarse, not silky smooth, when being spread over skin.

I got this primarily because of the container. It looks nicer than the usual all white bottles of baby powder. I just refill from my larger bottles. Review Title: feels like all other cornstarch Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK,Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist Settings Review Date: 2021/07/25 Store: Cherry Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 6.5 x 3.4 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '791523234156'} Review Text: Cherry Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK, Refillable 16 oz 2pk

I got these because I wanted the glass bottles to hold and keep filtered water handy near the stove for when I'm cooking need to give what I'm cooking a quick spritz of water. I don't like the nozzle because there are only two spray settings. I much prefer fully adjustable nozzles so I ditched the nozzle the bottle came with and just reused an older one I have. Review Title: Glass bottle for cooking water Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Method Gel Hand Wash, Waterfall, 12oz, 3pk Review Date: 2021/11/25 Store: Method Product Description: ["המשקפיים יותר מלאות למחצה. בקבוקי כביסה ביד, גם. יתרה מכך, מלא לחלוטין. ולשם כך, אנו מציעים את המילוי הזה. הוא מלא מספיק ג'ל לשטיפת ידיים כדי למלא את הבקבוק שלך כמעט 3 פעמים (2.8x ליתר דיוק). בנוסף, שטיפת היד שלנו מיוצרת עם נוסחה מתכלה המופעלת על ידי חומרי ניקוי על בסיס צמחי ומרכיבים מתחשבים אחרים, וללא פרבנים או פתלטים. אז מלאו אותו. מכיוון שהדבר היחיד שגרוע יותר מידיים לא מספיק נקיות הוא שימוש בניגוב מכנסיים כפתרון ביניים.النظارات أفضل نصف كامل. زجاجات غسيل يدوي أيضاً. الأفضل من ذلك، كامل تمامًا. ولهذا السبب، نقدم هذه التعبئة. مليء بما فيه الكفاية للغسيل اليدوي من الجل لإعادة ملء زجاجتك تقريبًا 3 مرات (2.8 × على وجه التحديد). بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فإن غسول اليد الخاص بنا مصنوع من تركيبة قابلة للتحلل البيولوجي معززة بمنظفات نباتية ومكونات أخرى مدروسة وخالية من البارابين أو الفثالات. لذا املأها. لأن الشيء الوحيد أسوأ من تنظيف اليدين غير الكافي هو استخدام مسح السراويل كحل مؤقت.眼鏡較半飽。 也可以手洗。 更好的是,完全飽滿。 為此,我們提供此筆芯。 充滿足夠的洗手凝膠,可補充您的瓶子幾乎 3 次(準確 2.8 倍)。 此外,我們的洗手液採用可生物降解的配方,由植物性清潔劑和其他周到的成分製成,不含對羥基苯甲酸酯或鄰苯二甲酸酯。 所以請填寫 'er'。 因為唯一比雙手清潔不足更糟糕的是使用褲子擦拭作為臨時解決方案。 \u200b"] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Method', 'Scent': 'Waterfall', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.25 x 7.48 x 3.31 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ME-395B', 'UPC': '885376710056', 'Manufacturer': 'Alere'} Review Text: Method Gel Hand Wash, Waterfall, 12oz, 3pk

I love the shape of the bottle, the color and the mild sweet scent. The soap was fairly thick. It was adequately sudsy. What I hated was the pump. However, this type of container isn't well suited for squeezing out gels in small amounts. The bottle is so soft that you have to really be careful with how you squeeze it. raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Brand Loyalty:** Strong inclination towards Higher Education skincare products, despite mixed reviews regarding product freshness.
- **Product Types:** Preference for moisturizing creams, exfoliating scrubs, and serums, particularly those suited for sensitive skin.
- **Texture and Scent:** Likes light, non-greasy textures (e.g., cucumber scent) and appreciates fine exfoliating particles over coarse ones.
- **Expiration Concerns:** Expresses dissatisfaction with receiving products nearing expiration, indicating a preference for fresher stock.
- **Sustainability and Quality:** Shows concern for product quality and company practices, notably with regards to old stock sales.
- **Scents:** Positive response toward specific scents, particularly white musk, indicating a preference for mild, appealing fragrances.
- **Container Preferences:** Prefers reusable and functional containers across various products (e.g., spray bottles and travel containers).
- **Value and Prices:** Aware of product pricing, often noting the quality in relation to cost, and expressing mixed feelings about higher-priced items versus perceived value.
- **Comfort and Practicality:** Values comfort and functionality in items used daily (e.g., masks and scrubbing tools), and has specific critiques regarding fit and usability.

**Overall Trend:** The individual demonstrates a discerning attitude towards skincare products, emphasizing the importance of quality, scent, and freshness, while being willing to experiment with new items only if quality is assured.

target_interaction.title: gentle
target_interaction.text:
ZZLOVE Amino Acids Body Wash 10.2Fl Oz

Gentle and moisturizing. Mild scent. Lathers and rinses off well. Doesn't leave a sticky feel on my skin.
